From: Richard Turner

Subject: [nihontostudy] While were on Tsuba kantei


http://www.seikeido.com/seikeido/tuba/t0149tessen.htm

I am thinking to a responce from Jim re my Shôami shiiremono guard, looking at this piece, would this be Nara ???

cheers

Rich

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: While were on Tsuba kantei
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, it s Heianjo zogan as it s described on the page.  Not sure I agree exactly with their date, but I don t want to start in on dealer sites any more that
messages.messageBody:
Yes, it's Heianjo zogan as it's described on the page. Not sure I agree exactly with their date, but I don't want to start in on dealer sites any more that I'd like to dissect eBay sales.

Nara work is quite different. Not knowing what books you have it's hard to tell you where to look next. Does anyone have any genuine high-quality Nara or early Hamano school examples on line?

Jim
